title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Monday Night Football game with ESPN analyst Dan Orlovsky. Should there be concerns surrounding the Rams offense? DP takes a look at a couple stories about cheating, talking to Matt Markey about a cheating scandal in the sport of fishing, and Kenneth W. Regan of the University of Buffalo shares some insight into cheating in chess.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
